lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ford Motor Co of Canada Ltd, 90 pct owned by Ford Motor Co <F>, said the earlier reported decline in full year net profit was mainly due to changeoover costs at its Essex, Ontario engine plant.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ford Canada said sales were boosted by its Ford Tempo car and Ford light truck, both manufactured in Oakville, which were Canada's best selling car and truck nameplates in 1986.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ford Canada also said sharply improved fourth quarter results were due to improved cost recovery and lower product program costs, partially offset by lower engine production.
